short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gradebook Paste for Chromebook allows you to quickly and easily paste grades from Mastery Manager into your online gradebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Important Note: This extension is currently a beta release and is not compatible with Android applications.

This extension is supported on devices running Chrome OS only. It is not supported in the Chrome browser on Windows or MacOS. Windows and Mac users should download the native Gradebook Paste applications for those platforms. Please contact Master Manager support if you have any questions.
